channel.title: Battle Timers error

item.title: Battle Timers error
item.dc:creator: @Old_spice Old spice
item.description:
@Old_spice wrote:

i took a basic battle timer’s table and reworked it for my server: editing some of the timers as i saw fit and adding new with the same format that i made my old timers in, but i am getting an error in my compiler (the old 100 error ofcourse) saying that ; was expected, but i looked it over many times and couldn’t find the problem. give me a hand?

[code]}
